I dont know if the queen and a bunch of 15pt broods is enough to really build a whole team around. Kind of reminds me of Moleman from F4 set. An interesting splash into your monster team but pretty average at best. Likely to be used as mastermind fodder than doing any actual attacking with.

May 30, 2021
toomanybatmans
Brood should not be able to be killed in two clicks. the average Brood soldier is pretty tough and they have both their carapace and claws. Their carapace is supposed to be as strong as plate mail, which should put them at Toughness level across all clix. All Brood should have Flurry, since they can attack both with their claws and their poison stinger tail almost simultaneously.
